definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: Is this the correct way to use the pumping lemma?
sentences.chinese: 這是使用的泵引理的正確方法？

sentences.english: The splitting lemma is a fundamental theorem in catastrophe theory.
sentences.chinese: 分裂引理是突變論的基本定理。

sentences.english: In probability methods, local lemma is a key technology.
sentences.chinese: 在概率方法中，局部引理是一個關鍵技術。

sentences.english: It is given a geometrical proof of an essential combinatorial lemma of Liao.
sentences.chinese: 給出廖山濤一個關鍵的組合引理一個幾何式的證明。

sentences.english: We will give reduce demonstration for a lemma in four values theorem of meromorphic function.
sentences.chinese: 給出了亞純函數四值定理中一個引理的簡化證明。

sentences.english: In chapter one, the basic concepts and lemmas .
sentences.chinese: 第一章，基本概念和引理。

sentences.english: For instance, suppose one has a serviceable lemma that suffices for the task of proving the main theorems of the paper at hand.
sentences.chinese: 比方說某人有一條引理用於證明論文的主命題。

sentences.english: On the normality of a class of compound holomorphic functions;
sentences.chinese: 給出了亞純函數四值定理中一個引理的簡化證明。

sentences.english: We shall prove the following ungainly technical lemma.
sentences.chinese: 我們來證明下面的冗長的技術性的引理。

sentences.english: Specifically we mainly introduce the definition of Lyapunov function, Nussbaum function and some related lemmas.
sentences.chinese: 主要包括一些基本的概念，相關的理論以及引理。
